title: Starfield Finally Has a Release Date - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.08.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Tim and Blessing talk about Starfield's new date and what that means for the rest of Xbox's 2023!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
0:08:39 - Housekeeping
A New Gamescast is up featuring Tamoor Hussain breaking down his time at Super Nintendo World and us talking about whether Tears of The Kingdom and other games can live up to their predecessors. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
If you’re looking for Mandalorian discussions after last night’s episode, you can watch Screencast LIVE on YouTube.com/KindaFunny at 11:30am PT today where the Star Wars crew will talk all about their opinions and theories!
The Roper Report   -
00:10:55 - Starfield Launches in September
00:30:42 - Discord Voice Chat Is Now Available on PlayStation 5
00:38:24 - Microsoft confirms it will let Sony put Call of Duty on PS Plus on day one
00:47:59 - Wargroove 2 has been announced
00:50:18 - LEGO Disney Games Among A Few Cancellations at TT Games
00:55:50 - Out Today
00:57:25 - Squad Up: PS5 - Catastrophon - Pavlov
00:58:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Janet
